titleStmt.title: Christs exaltation purchast by humiliation Wherein you may see mercy and misery meete together. Very vsefull I. For instructing the ignorant. II. For comforting the weake. III. For confirming the strong. By R. Sibbs D.D. and preacher of Grayes-Inne, London. Published by T.G. and P.N.
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, and are to be sold by Iohn Bartlet at his shop, at the signe of the guilt Cup, neere S. Austins gate,

notesStmt.note: T.G. and P.N. = Thomas Goodwin and Philip Nye.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the guilt Cup, neere S. Austins gate
